dicomDeviceName.title: Device Name
dicomDeviceName.description: A unique name for this device

dicomDescription.title: Device Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the device

dicomManufacturer.title: Manufacturer
dicomManufacturer.description: Should be the same as the value of Manufacturer (0008,0070) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomManufacturerModelName.title: Manufacturer Model Name
dicomManufacturerModelName.description: Should be the same as the value of Manufacturer Model Name (0008,1090) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomSoftwareVersion.title: Software Version
dicomSoftwareVersion.description: Should be the same as the values of Software Versions (0018,1020) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomStationName.title: Station Name
dicomStationName.description: Should be the same as the value of Station Name (0008,1010) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomDeviceSerialNumber.title: Device Serial Number
dicomDeviceSerialNumber.description: Should be the same as the value of Device Serial Number (0018,1000) in SOP instances created by this device

dicomPrimaryDeviceType.title: Primary Device Type
dicomPrimaryDeviceType.description: Represents the kind of device and is most applicable for acquisition modalities

dicomInstitutionName.title: Institution Name
dicomInstitutionName.description: Should be the same as the value of Institution Name (0008,0080) in SOP Instances created by this device

dicomInstitutionAddress.title: Institution Address
dicomInstitutionAddress.description: Should be the same as the value of Institution Address (0008,0081) attribute in SOP Instances created by this device

dicomInstitutionDepartmentName.title: Institution Department Name
dicomInstitutionDepartmentName.description: Should be the same as the value of Institutional Department Name (0008,1040) in SOP Instances created by this device

dicomIssuerOfPatientID.title: Issuer of Patient ID
dicomIssuerOfPatientID.description: Default value for the Issuer of Patient ID (0010,0021), and optionally also default values for the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Patient ID Qualifiers Sequence (0010,0024) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Issuer of Patient ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfAccessionNumber.title: Issuer of Accession Number
dicomIssuerOfAccessionNumber.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Accession Number Sequence (0008,0051) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomOrderPlacerIdentifier.title: Order Placer Identifier
dicomOrderPlacerIdentifier.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Order Placer Identifier Sequence (0040,0026) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomOrderFillerIdentifier.title: Order Filler Identifier
dicomOrderFillerIdentifier.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Order Filler Identifier Sequence (0040,0027) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfAdmissionID.title: Issuer of Admission ID
dicomIssuerOfAdmissionID.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Admission ID Sequence (0038,0014) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfServiceEpisodeID.title: Issuer of Service Episode ID
dicomIssuerOfServiceEpisodeID.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Service Episode ID Sequence (0038,0064) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfContainerIdentifier.title: Issuer of Container Identifier
dicomIssuerOfContainerIdentifier.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Container Identifier Sequence (0040,0513) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomIssuerOfSpecimenIdentifier.title: Issuer of Specimen Identifier
dicomIssuerOfSpecimenIdentifier.description: Default values for the Local Namespace Entity ID (0040,0031), the Universal Entity ID (0040,0032) and the Universal Entity ID Type (0040,0033) of the Item of the Issuer of Specimen Identifier Sequence (0040,0562) for SOP Instances created or queried by this device. Format: <Local Namespace Entity ID>['&'<Universal Entity ID>'&'<Universal Entity ID Type>]

dicomAuthorizedNodeCertificateReference.title: Authorized Node Certificate Reference
dicomAuthorizedNodeCertificateReference.description: The DNs for the certificates of nodes that are authorized to connect to this device

dicomThisNodeCertificateReference.title: This Node Certificate Reference
dicomThisNodeCertificateReference.description: The DNs of the public certificate(s) for this node

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: Boolean to indicate whether this device is presently installed on the network

dicomNetworkConnection.title: Network Connection
dicomNetworkConnection.description: Describes one TCP/UDP port on one network device.

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name for the Network Connection object

dicomHostname.title: Hostname
dicomHostname.description: DNS name for this particular connection

dicomPort.title: Port
dicomPort.description: TCP/UDP port that a service is listening on. May be missing if this network connection is only used for outbound connections

dicomTLSCipherSuite.title: TLS CipherSuites
dicomTLSCipherSuite.description: The TLS CipherSuites that are supported on this particular connection. If not present TLS is disabled

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the Network Connection is installed on the network. If not present, information about the installed status of the Network Connection is inherited from the device

dcmProtocol.title: Protocol
dcmProtocol.description: Protocol of Network Connection: DICOM, HL7, SYSLOG_TLS or SYSLOG_UDP; DICOM if absent

dcmTLSNeedClientAuth.title: TLS Need Client Auth
dcmTLSNeedClientAuth.description: Indicates if TLS client authentication is required; required if absent

dcmTLSProtocol.title: TLS Protocol
dcmTLSProtocol.description: The Supported TLS Protocols; TLSv1, SSLv3 if absent

dcmTCPBacklog.title: TCP Backlog
dcmTCPBacklog.description: Maximum queue length for incoming TCP connections; 50 if absent

dcmTCPConnectTimeout.title: TCP Connect Timeout
dcmTCPConnectTimeout.description: TCP connect timeout in ms; no timeout if absent

dcmTCPCloseDelay.title: TCP Close Delay
dcmTCPCloseDelay.description: TCP socket close delay in ms after send of A-ASSOCIATE-RJ, A-RELEASE-RP or A-ABORT PDU; 50 ms if absent

dcmTCPSendBufferSize.title: TCP Send Buffer Size
dcmTCPSendBufferSize.description: TCP send buffer size; use system defaults if absent

dcmTCPReceiveBufferSize.title: TCP Receive Buffer Size
dcmTCPReceiveBufferSize.description: TCP receive buffer size; use system defaults if absent

dcmTCPNoDelay.title: TCP No Delay
dcmTCPNoDelay.description: Enable/disable TCP_NODELAY (disable/enable Nagle algorithm); disable Nagle algorithm if absent

dcmBindAddress.title: Bind Address
dcmBindAddress.description: Bind address of listening socket; use hostname of the connection if absent

dcmClientBindAddress.title: Client Bind Address
dcmClientBindAddress.description: Bind address of outgoing connections; use hostname of the connection if absent

dcmSendPDULength.title: Send PDU Length
dcmSendPDULength.description: Maximal length of emitted PDUs; 16378 if absent

dcmReceivePDULength.title: Receive PDU Length
dcmReceivePDULength.description: Maximal length of received PDUs; 16378 if absent

dcmMaxOpsPerformed.title: Max Ops Performed
dcmMaxOpsPerformed.description: Maximal number of operations to perform asynchronously; 0 = infinite; 1 (=synchronous) if absent

dcmMaxOpsInvoked.title: Max Ops Invoked
dcmMaxOpsInvoked.description: Maximal number of operations to invoke asynchronously; 0 = infinite; 1 (=synchronous) if absent

dcmPackPDV.title: Pack PDV
dcmPackPDV.description: Enable/disable packing of command and data PDVs into one P-DATA-TF PDU; enabled if absent

dcmAARQTimeout.title: AA-RQ Timeout
dcmAARQTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of A-ASSOCIATE-RQ PDU after TCP connect; no timeout if absent

dcmAAACTimeout.title: AA-AC Timeout
dcmAAACTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of A-ASSOCIATE-AC PDU after send of A-ASSOCIATE-RQ PDU; no timeout if absent

dcmARRPTimeout.title: AR-RP Timeout
dcmARRPTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of A-RELEASE-RP PDU after send of A-RELEASE-RQ PDU; no timeout if absent

dcmResponseTimeout.title: Response Timeout
dcmResponseTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of response message; no timeout if absent

dcmRetrieveTimeout.title: Retrieve Timeout
dcmRetrieveTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of C-GET-RSP or C-MOVE-RSP; no timeout if absent

dcmIdleTimeout.title: Idle Timeout
dcmIdleTimeout.description: Indicates aborting of idle Associations after specified timeout in ms; no timeout if absent

dicomNetworkAE.title: Network AE
dicomNetworkAE.description: Application entity that provides services on a network

dicomAETitle.title: AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: Unique AE title for this Network AE

dicomNetworkConnectionReference.title: Network Connection Reference
dicomNetworkConnectionReference.description: JSON Pointers to the Network Connection objects for this AE

dicomAssociationInitiator.title: Association Initiator
dicomAssociationInitiator.description: True if the Network AE can initiate associations, false otherwise

dicomAssociationAcceptor.title: Association Acceptor
dicomAssociationAcceptor.description: True if the Network AE can accept associations, false otherwise

dicomDescription.title: AE Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the application entity

dicomApplicationCluster.title: Application Cluster
dicomApplicationCluster.description: Locally defined names for a subset of related applications

dicomPreferredCalledAETitle.title: Preferred Called AE Title
dicomPreferredCalledAETitle.description: AE Title(s) that are preferred for initiating associations

dicomPreferredCallingAETitle.title: Preferred Calling AE Title
dicomPreferredCallingAETitle.description: AE Title(s) that are preferred for accepting associations

dicomSupportedCharacterSet.title: Supported Character Set
dicomSupportedCharacterSet.description: Character Set(s) supported by the Network AE for data sets it receives

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the AE is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the AE is inherited from the device

dicomTransferCapability.title: Transfer Capability
dicomTransferCapability.description: Each transfer capability specifies the SOP class that the Network AE can support, the mode that it can utilize (SCP or SCU), and the Transfer Syntax(es) that it can utilize

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name for the Transfer Capability object

dicomTransferSyntax.title: Transfer Syntax
dicomTransferSyntax.description: Transfer syntax(es) that may be requested as an SCU or that are offered as an SCP

dcmRelationalQueries.title: Relational Queries
dcmRelationalQueries.description: Enable/disable relational queries; disabled if absent

dcmCombinedDateTimeMatching.title: Combined Date Time Matching
dcmCombinedDateTimeMatching.description: Enable/disable combined date time matching; disabled if absent

dcmFuzzySemanticMatching.title: Fuzzy Semantic Matching
dcmFuzzySemanticMatching.description: Enable/disable fuzzy semantic matching of person  names; disabled if absent

dcmTimezoneQueryAdjustment.title: Timezone Query Adjustment
dcmTimezoneQueryAdjustment.description: Enable/disable timezone query adjustment; disabled if absent

dcmStorageConformance.title: Storage Conformance
dcmStorageConformance.description: Indicates level of Conformance of a Storage SCP

dcmDigitalSignatureSupport.title: Digital Signature Support
dcmDigitalSignatureSupport.description: Indicates level of Digital Signature Support of a Storage SCP

dcmDataElementCoercion.title: Data Element Coercion
dcmDataElementCoercion.description: Indicates coercion of Data Elements of a Storage SCP

dcmNetworkAE.title: dcm4che Network AE Attributes
dcmNetworkAE.description: dcm4che proprietary Attributes of Network AE

dcmAcceptedCallingAETitle.title: Accepted Calling AE Title
dcmAcceptedCallingAETitle.description: Prohibit accepting associations from unlisted AE. If not present, any AE will be accepted

dcmOtherAETitle.title: Other AE Title
dcmOtherAETitle.description: Additional AE Title of Network AE - will also accept Association RQs with such Called AE Title

dcmLimitOpenAssociations.title: Limit Open Associations
dcmLimitOpenAssociations.description: Limit open DICOM connections; rejects Association requests if the limit is exceeded; 0 (=no limit) if absent

dcmTrustStoreURL.title: Trust Store URL
dcmTrustStoreURL.description: URL of Trust Store with Certificates for DICOM nodes that are authorized to connect to this node; overrides dicomAuthorizedNodeCertificateReference

dcmTrustStoreType.title: Trust Store Type
dcmTrustStoreType.description: Key Store Type of Trust Store specified by dcmTrustStoreURL. JKS or PKCS12

dcmTrustStorePin.title: Trust Store Pin
dcmTrustStorePin.description: Key Store Password of Trust Store specified by Trust Store URL

dcmTrustStorePinProperty.title: Trust Store Pin Property
dcmTrustStorePinProperty.description: System property of Key Store Password of Trust Store specified by Trust Store URL

dcmKeyStoreURL.title: Key Store URL
dcmKeyStoreURL.description: URL of Key Store with private Key and certificate used to identify this DICOM node in TLS connections

dcmKeyStoreType.title: Key Store Type
dcmKeyStoreType.description: Key Store Type of Key Store specified by Key Store URL. JKS or PKCS12

dcmKeyStorePin.title: Key Store Pin
dcmKeyStorePin.description: Key Store Password of Key Store specified by Key Store URL

dcmKeyStorePinProperty.title: Key Store Pin Property
dcmKeyStorePinProperty.description: System property of Key Store Password of Key Store specified by Key Store URL

dcmKeyStoreKeyPin.title: Key Store Key Pin
dcmKeyStoreKeyPin.description: Key Password of Key Store specified by Key Store URL

dcmKeyStoreKeyPinProperty.title: Key Store Key Pin Property
dcmKeyStoreKeyPinProperty.description: System property of Key Password of Key Store specified by Key Store URL

dcmTimeZoneOfDevice.title: Time Zone of Device
dcmTimeZoneOfDevice.description: Time Zone ID of the Device; matches Java TimeZone ID

dicomNetworkConnectionReference.title: Network Connection Reference
dicomNetworkConnectionReference.description: The JSON Pointers to the Network Connection objects for this HL7 Application

hl7AcceptedSendingApplication.title: Accepted Sending Application
hl7AcceptedSendingApplication.description: Application^Facility name of accepted Sending Application(s); any if absent

hl7DefaultCharacterSet.title: Default Character Set
hl7DefaultCharacterSet.description: Character Set used to decode received messages if not specified by MSH-18, ASCII if absent

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the HL7 Application is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the HL7 Application is inherited from the device

dcmImageReader.title: Image Reader
dcmImageReader.description: Specifies Java Image IO Image Readers used for decompressing compressed DICOM images

dicomTransferSyntax.title: Transfer Syntax
dicomTransferSyntax.description: Transfer Syntax of compressed DICOM image

dcmJavaClassName.title: Java Class Name
dcmJavaClassName.description: Fully qualified Java class of Image IO Reader. If absent, use any Image Reader found for specified Format Name

dcmPatchJPEGLS.title: Patch JPEG-LS
dcmPatchJPEGLS.description: Patch JPEG-LS before decompressing: JAI2ISO, ISO2JAI or ISO2JAI_IF_APP_OR_COM

dcmImageWriter.title: Image Writer
dcmImageWriter.description: Specifies Java Image IO Image Writer and Write Parameter used for compressing DICOM images

dicomTransferSyntax.title: Transfer Syntax
dicomTransferSyntax.description: Transfer Syntax to which to compress the DICOM image

dcmJavaClassName.title: Java Class Name
dcmJavaClassName.description: Fully qualified Java class of Image IO Writer. If absent, use any Image Writer found for specified Format Name

dcmPatchJPEGLS.title: Patch JPEG-LS
dcmPatchJPEGLS.description: Patch JPEG-LS after compressing: JAI2ISO, ISO2JAI or ISO2JAI_IF_APP_OR_COM

dcmImageWriteParam.title: Image Write Param
dcmImageWriteParam.description: Image Write Parameter(s) (name=value) set at on Image Writer before compression

dicomNetworkConnectionReference.title: Network Connection Reference
dicomNetworkConnectionReference.description: The JSON Pointers to the Network Connection objects used by this Audit Logger

dcmAuditRecordRepositoryDeviceName.title: Audit Record Repository Device Name
dcmAuditRecordRepositoryDeviceName.description: Device Name of Audit Record Repository to which Audit Messages are sent

dcmAuditSourceID.title: Source ID
dcmAuditSourceID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Source ID; device name if absent

dcmAuditEnterpriseSiteID.title: Enterprise Site ID
dcmAuditEnterpriseSiteID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Enterprise Site ID; value 'dicomInstitutionName' is replaced by the institution name of the DICOM device

dcmAuditSourceTypeCode.title: Source Type Code
dcmAuditSourceTypeCode.description: RFC 3881 Audit Source Type Code; value 'dicomPrimaryDeviceType' is replaced by the primary type of the DICOM device

dcmAuditFacility.title: Syslog Facility
dcmAuditFacility.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Facility value of audit message: 0-23; 10 (authpriv) if absent

dcmAuditSuccessSeverity.title: Syslog Severity - Success
dcmAuditSuccessSeverity.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Severity of audit message with Event Outcome Indicator 0 (Success); 5 (notice) if absent

dcmAuditMinorFailureSeverity.title: Syslog Severity - Failure
dcmAuditMinorFailureSeverity.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Severity of audit message with Event Outcome Indicator 4 (Minor failure); 4 (warning) if absent

dcmAuditSeriousFailureSeverity.title: Syslog Severity - Failure
dcmAuditSeriousFailureSeverity.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Severity of audit message with Event Outcome Indicator 8 (Serious failure); 3 (err) if absent

dcmAuditMajorFailureSeverity.title: Syslog Severity - Major
dcmAuditMajorFailureSeverity.description: RFC 5424 Syslog Severity of audit message with Event Outcome Indicator 12 (Major failure); 2 (crit) if absent

dcmAuditApplicationName.title: Syslog Application Name
dcmAuditApplicationName.description: RFC 5424 Syslog APP-NAME of audit message; Audit Source ID if absent

dcmAuditMessageID.title: Syslog Message ID
dcmAuditMessageID.description: RFC 5424 Syslog MSGID of audit message; DICOM+RFC3881 if absent

dcmAuditMessageEncoding.title: Message Encoding
dcmAuditMessageEncoding.description: Character encoding of RFC 5424 Syslog MSG part of audit message; UTF-8 if absent

dcmAuditMessageBOM.title: Message BOM
dcmAuditMessageBOM.description: Enable/disable Unicode BOM prefix of RFC 5424 Syslog MSG part of audit message; include BOM if absent

dcmAuditTimestampInUTC.title: Timestamp in UTC
dcmAuditTimestampInUTC.description: Specify if RFC 5424 Syslog TIMESTAMP and the Event Date/Time of the audit message are specified in Coordinated Universal Time or in Local Time; use Local Time zone if absent

dcmAuditMessageFormatXML.title: Message Format XML
dcmAuditMessageFormatXML.description: Specify whether or not the XML audit message is formatted with linefeeds and indentation; disabled if absent

dcmAuditMessageSchemaURI.title: Message Schema URI
dcmAuditMessageSchemaURI.description: URI of DICOM Audit Message Schema referenced in audit message

dcmAuditIncludeInstanceUID.title: Include Instance UIDs
dcmAuditIncludeInstanceUID.description: Indicates if Audit Log Message should contain optional Instance UIDs

dcmAuditLoggerSpoolDirectoryURI.title: Spool Directory URI
dcmAuditLoggerSpoolDirectoryURI.description: URI of spool directory used to store messages which could not delivered to the record repository; use system temporary directory if absent

dcmAuditLoggerRetryInterval.title: Retry Interval
dcmAuditLoggerRetryInterval.description: Retry interval in s to re-sent messages which could not delivered to the record repository; do no retry to re-sent messages if absent

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the Audit Logger is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the Audit Logger is inherited from the device

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the Audit Suppress Criteria

dcmAuditEventID.title: Audit Event ID
dcmAuditEventID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Event ID code and codeSystemName in format (CV, CSD, "CM")

dcmAuditEventTypeCode.title: Audit Event Type Code
dcmAuditEventTypeCode.description: RFC 3881 Audit Event Type code in format (CV, CSD, "CM")

dcmAuditEventActionCode.title: Event Action Code
dcmAuditEventActionCode.description: RFC 3881 Audit Event Action Type code. Enumerated values: C, R, U, D, E

dcmAuditEventOutcomeIndicator.title: Event Outcome Indicator
dcmAuditEventOutcomeIndicator.description: RFC 3881 Audit Event Outcome Indicator. Enumerated values: 0, 4, 8, 12

dcmAuditUserID.title: User ID
dcmAuditUserID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Active Participant User ID

dcmAuditAlternativeUserID.title: Alternative User ID
dcmAuditAlternativeUserID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Active Participant Alternative User ID

dcmAuditUserRoleIDCode.title: User Role ID Code
dcmAuditUserRoleIDCode.description: RFC 3881 Audit Active Participant User Role ID code in format (CV, CSD, "CM")

dcmAuditNetworkAccessPointID.title: Network Access Point ID
dcmAuditNetworkAccessPointID.description: RFC 3881 Audit Active Participant Network Access Point ID

dcmAuditUserIsRequestor.title: User is Requestor
dcmAuditUserIsRequestor.description: Indicates if Active Participant is initiator/requestor of the Audit Event as specified by RFC 3881

dicomNetworkConnectionReference.title: Network Connection Reference
dicomNetworkConnectionReference.description: The JSON Pointers to the Network Connection objects of this Audit Record Repository

dicomInstalled.title: installed
dicomInstalled.description: True if the ARR is installed on network. If not present, information about the installed status of the ARR is inherited from the device
